member.name: T:Notepad.My.MyWpfExtension
member.summary: Module utilisé pour définir les propriétés qui sont disponibles dans l'espace de noms My pour WPF

member.name: P:Notepad.My.MyWpfExtension.Application
member.summary: Retourne l'objet application pour l'application en cours d'exécution

member.name: P:Notepad.My.MyWpfExtension.Computer
member.summary: Retourne les informations relatives à l'ordinateur hôte.

member.name: P:Notepad.My.MyWpfExtension.User
member.summary: Retourne les informations relatives à l'utilisateur actuel. Si vous souhaitez exécuter l'application avec les informations d'identification de l'utilisateur Windows, appelez My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser().

member.name: P:Notepad.My.MyWpfExtension.Log
member.summary: Retourne le journal des applications. L'écouteur peut être configuré par le fichier de configuration de l'application.

member.name: P:Notepad.My.MyWpfExtension.Windows
member.summary: Retourne la collection de fenêtres définie dans le projet.

member.name: T:Notepad.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Une classe de ressource fortement typée destinée, entre autres, à la consultation des chaînes localisées.

member.name: P:Notepad.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Retourne l'instance ResourceManager mise en cache utilisée par cette classe.

member.name: P:Notepad.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Remplace la propriété CurrentUICulture du thread actuel pour toutes les recherches de ressources à l'aide de cette classe de ressource fortement typée.

member.name: T:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient
member.remarks: This class does not hold open an FTP connection but instead is stateless: for each FTP request it connects, performs the request and disconnects.

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.#ctor
member.remarks: Hostname, username and password must be set manually

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: in either ftp://ftp.host.com or ftp.host.com form

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor taking hostname, username and password
member.param: in either ftp://ftp.host.com or ftp.host.com form
Leave blank to use 'anonymous' but set password to your email

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.ListDirectory(System.String)
member.returns: A list of filenames and directories as a List(of String)
member.remarks: For a detailed directory listing, use ListDirectoryDetail

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.Upload(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copy a local file to the FTP server
member.param: Full path of the local file
member.remarks: If the target filename is blank, the source filename is used (assumes current directory). Otherwise use a filename to specify a name or a full path and filename if required.

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.Upload(System.IO.FileInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Upload a local file to the FTP server

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.Download(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copy a file from FTP server to local
member.param: Full path of the local file
member.remarks: Target can be blank (use same filename), or just a filename (assumes current directory) or a full path and filename

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.FtpFileExists(System.String)
member.summary: Determine if file exists on remote FTP site
member.param: Filename (for current dir) or full path
member.remarks: Note this only works for files

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.GetFileSize(System.String)
member.remarks: Throws an exception if file does not exist

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.GetFullPath(System.String)
member.summary: returns a full path using CurrentDirectory for a relative file reference

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.AdjustDir(System.String)
member.summary: Amend an FTP path so that it always starts with /

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.GetStringResponse(System.Net.FtpWebRequest)
member.summary: Obtains a response stream as a string
member.remarks: FTP servers typically return strings with CR and not CRLF. Use respons.Replace(vbCR, vbCRLF) to convert to an MSDOS string

member.name: M:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.GetSize(System.Net.FtpWebRequest)
member.summary: Gets the size of an FTP request

member.name: P:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.Hostname
member.remarks: Hostname can be in either the full URL format ftp://ftp.myhost.com or just ftp.myhost.com

member.name: P:Notepad.Utilities.FTP.FTPclient.Username
member.remarks: Can be left blank, in which case 'anonymous' is returned

member.summary: List of REGEX formats for different FTP server listing formats
member.remarks: The first three are various UNIX/LINUX formats, fourth is for MS FTP in detailed mode and the last for MS FTP in 'DOS' mode. I wish VB.NET had support for Const arrays like C# but there you go
